column5: I have a couple of down rigger balls (weights) that a friend gave me years ago and I don't use. They have been sitting in my garage collecting dust and thought someone here might be able to put them to good use. They are free to the first person that wants them but you'll have to pick them up here in Lindsay.
I will swing by this spring and pick them up Cliff.
Going to hang them off your back bumper Pete. LOL
I'll put your name on them Pete.
Thanks Clif, and no Brian, I am going to tie them to my wifes legs so that she does not go clothes or shoe shopping
I think I'll refrain from commenting on Pete's new b............
Yeah no kidding Brian. Is she finds out that I posted this, its game over
Ya just have to get BIGGER BALLS Pete.
I think he just did LOL
At least heavier ones............LOL  Regards, Sam
